context:
### Idiom: 清灰冷火
### Meaning: 没吃没喝。常用以形容贫困冷清的景象。同清灰冷灶”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 此去一别岁月多， 如何凭说， 莫，漠，陌。山遥海阔，隐隐绅绅， 清灰冷火又添几箩。愁坐，花下酌，与谁说.
target: This gone for so long, how can I say, '莫, 漠, 陌?' Mountains and seas, hidden and veiled, and a few gray smoke and cold fire.

context:
### Idiom: 沆瀣一气
### Meaning: 宋钱易《南部新书》戊集载，唐代崔瀣参加科举考试，被考官崔沆录取。当时有人嘲笑说：“座主门生，沆瀣一气。”后用以喻气味相投的人联结在一起。多用于贬义。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 学习院是贵族子弟学校，近卫的父亲近卫笃磨就是学习院的院长。后来，木户与近卫不仅始终保持着个人关系，同时还在政治上一唱一和、沆瀣一气，作为革新贵族的代表人物，成为日本政治舞台的重要角色。中学四年级的时候，木户曾参加了海军士官学校的考试，但因耳鼓膜损伤，体检未能通过。
target: The Academic Institute is a school for nobles' children, and the father of Konoe, Konoe Fumimaro, was the principal of the Institute. Later on, Muto and Konoe not only maintained their personal relationships, but also cooperated in politics, becoming important figures on the Japanese political stage as representatives of the reformist nobility. In his fourth year of middle school, Muto once took the exam for the Naval Officer School, but he failed the physical examination due to a damaged eardrum.

context:
### Idiom: 口服心服
### Meaning: 不仅口头表示信服，内心也信服。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: ‘一国两制’需要政府大力推动，更需要居民参与其中。全港上下一起推动‘一国两制’落到实处，有靓丽的成绩单令到居民口服心服；有事实胜于雄辩的成绩，向全世界展示‘一国两制’实践的示范性、卓越性、可操作性以及可复制性。如果有一天，香港居民深刻感受到，‘一国两制’不再是一句简单的口号，而是富裕、法治和自由的代名词。
target: "One Country, Two Systems" requires not only strong promotion from the government, but also participation from the residents. All sectors of Hong Kong should work together to put "One Country, Two Systems" into action, achieving impressive results that would make residents fully satisfied; with facts speaking louder than words, demonstrating the exemplary, outstanding, operable and replicable nature of "One Country, Two Systems" implementation to the world. If one day, Hong Kong residents deeply feel that "One Country, Two Systems" is no longer just a simple slogan, but a synonym for prosperity, rule of law and freedom.

context:
### Idiom: 沆瀣一气
### Meaning: 宋钱易《南部新书》戊集载，唐代崔瀣参加科举考试，被考官崔沆录取。当时有人嘲笑说：“座主门生，沆瀣一气。”后用以喻气味相投的人联结在一起。多用于贬义。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 在中天【中天朋友圈｜哏传媒】开节目散布消息，说两岸一旦发生战争，不要相信政府官员和首长，说国军没有抵抗力，说不要相信民防，告诉大家不要抵抗，被敌军侵略只是换个政府而已。然后底下留言统派和中国网民沆瀣一气，希望中国赶快打来？ 2016年1月20日，在2016年中国大陆网友“出征”Facebook事件中，有台湾网友引用之前蔡正元记者会时称蔡英文为“蔡姐姐”，该网友称蔡正元为蔡英文的弟弟，因而误导许多中国大陆网友来攻击蔡正元脸书。
target: 2016 January 20th, in 2016's Chinese Facebook invasion of Facebook, a Taiwanese commentator referred to former Chief of Staff Tsai Chin-yun as "Chai Madam", a Taiwanese commentator believed Tsai Chin-yun was her brother, and thus confused many Chinese Facebook users to attack Tsai Chin-yun's Facebook page.

context:
### Idiom: 自求多福
### Meaning: 求助自己比求助他人会得到更多的幸福。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 游戏的主角是一只没头没脑的肥猩猩，看到香蕉苹果就毫无节制的狂吃，直至那堆积成山的水果皮铺天为地如汹涌澎湃般汹涌而至，嘴馋的肥猩猩瞬间惊倒。自然，这类撞击也会减少野猪同学们的血量，一旦血量为0，我们自己的主角也就只能自求多福了。
target: The protagonist of the game is a senseless, fat orangutan who, upon seeing bananas and apples, eats them uncontrollably until the mountain of fruit peels surges like a tidal wave, leaving the gluttonous orangutan instantly stunned. Naturally, such impacts will also reduce the health of the wild boars. Once their health reaches zero, our protagonist can only hope for the best.

context:
### Idiom: 抱薪救火
### Meaning: 薪柴草。抱着柴草去救火。比喻用错误的方法去消除灾祸，结果使灾祸反而扩大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 大家都只看到违约，却没看到上至高管下至主管纷纷又提了一套京沪豪宅抱薪救火啊。
target: Everybody only sees default, but didn't see from senior management to department heads all bought a set of Beijing-Shanghai luxury villa to hold fire.

context:
### Idiom: 敲榨勒索
### Meaning: 依仗势力或抓籽柄进行恐吓，用威胁手段索取财物。同敲诈勒索”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 有言釐金征收效率低下，偷税现象猖獗。釐金亦被视为腐败的根源，因为抽釐会引起敲榨勒索:71。抽税设关之初，征收颇为混乱，1861年御史陈廷经指出，各地所谓抽釐就是抽分抽钱，不分城市乡村，不分行商坐贾、资本厚薄，甚至连行人金眷随身携带盘川、包裹都遭敲诈。
target: It is said that tax collection efficiency is low and tax evasion is rampant. Lijin was also seen as a source of corruption, as it led to extortion:71. At the beginning of the tax collection and customs establishment, the collection was quite chaotic. In 1861, Chen Tingjing, the censor, pointed out that the so-called tax collection in various places meant to draw money, regardless of urban and rural areas, regardless of whether there were merchants, merchants, or capital levels. Sichuan and parcels were extorted.

context:
### Idiom: 不卑不亢
### Meaning: 卑低、自卑；亢高傲。指对人有恰当的分寸，既不低声下气，也不傲慢自大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 每天面对长官欺凌、新生间打小报告。绝望之际，眼见陈萍的强烈求生意志，与严水霞于苦难中的不卑不亢，以及与林耀辉萌芽中的爱情，杏惠重拾信念。同时，处部发起“一人一事良心救国运动”，引起新生反抗。
target: Each day she faces bullying from their supervisors, gossiping with the freshmen. When she lost hope, seeing Chen Ping's strong will to live, and Han Shu-xia's courage in the face of difficulty, and Lin Yao-wei's growing love, Kanei rediscovered her hope. At the same time, the branch organized "one person, one act, one salvation" campaign, causing the freshmen to rebel.

context:
### Idiom: 随地随时
### Meaning: ①指依照当时当地情形；在不同的时间、地点。②任何时间、地点；时时处处。同随时随地”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 复古传奇是一款全新打怪升级的传奇手机游戏，地图场面多方面打开3D实景方式，能够达成全局灵活观看和随地随时的地方传送。
target: Retro Legend is a brand new and upgraded legend mobile game. The map scene opens up 3D real-life mode in all aspects, allowing for global flexible viewing and teleportation anywhere and at any time.

context:
### Idiom: 谈情说爱
### Meaning: 谈恋爱。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 谈情说爱的好日子。遇到心动的对象别错过，有利勇敢示爱，体验别样爱恋。
target: A good day for romance. Don’t miss it when you meet the person you love, it will help you show your love bravely and experience a different kind of love.

context:
### Idiom: 恢诡谲怪
### Meaning: 指离奇怪异。同恢恑憰怪”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 啊啊啊好讨厌你们一些乙解把纸片人角色代入进现实中三次元声优男中，能不能彻底割席啊非要让我知道帅脸下声音来源的人是长着一张恢诡谲怪的脸是吧。
target: Ahhh, I hate you some occults that take paper man characters into reality and make them into 3D voice actors, can you stop being absolutely nuts and telling me that the voice behind the boy's beautiful face is a very strange face, really?

context:
### Idiom: 先斩后奏
### Meaning: ①《新五代史·梁臣传·硃珍》：“珍偏将张仁遇白珍曰：‘军中有犯令者，请先斩而后白。’”后以“先斩后奏”指执法官吏先处决罪犯，然后向上奏闻。②今多借以比喻先采取行动，然后再上报。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 这让目前身在北京的双汇集团董事长万隆感到有些意外和委屈。事后，作为双汇十大流通股东之一的兴业基金曾公开发表观点认为，议案之所以遭到否决，一方面原因在于双汇的“先斩后奏”——早在2009年已经发生的股权转让，却在一年之后才提出迟来的议案，表明公司治理方面存在问题和漏洞；另一方面，公司放弃9家优质子公司股权的优先受让权，转而受让给公司高管间接控股的公司，损害了公司乃至流通股东的利益。”万隆对记者表示，“一旦方案出台，将使得双汇上市公司与集团间的同业竞争彻底消失，关联交易大幅降低！”。
target: This made Wan Long, chairman of Shuanghui Group, who is currently in Beijing, feel a little surprised and aggrieved. Afterwards, Industrial Fund, one of the ten largest tradable shareholders of Shuanghui, publicly stated that the reason why the proposal was rejected was partly due to Shuanghui's "cut first and then play later" - the equity transfer that had occurred as early as 2009 was not completed in one day. The belated motion was proposed only after 2018, indicating that there are problems and loopholes in corporate governance; on the other hand, the company gave up the priority transfer rights of the equity of nine high-quality subsidiaries and instead transferred them to companies indirectly controlled by the company's executives, which harmed the company. interests of the company and even the circulating shareholders. "Wan Long told reporters, "Once the plan is introduced, the competition between Shuanghui listed companies and the group will completely disappear, and related transactions will be significantly reduced! ".

context:
### Idiom: 助纣为虐
### Meaning: 比喻帮助坏人干坏事。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 因为新盟友有暴力倾向，遇到反抗激烈，会使用绷带把他固定在13号室的小黑床上，等待点评师的到来。很多网友会说，这是不是助纣为虐啊。我们必须服从班长和杨永信，不然会被电击。
target: Because the new ally has violent tendencies and encounters fierce resistance, bandages will be used to fix him on the small black bed in Room 13, waiting for the arrival of the reviewer. Many netizens will ask whether this is aiding the evildoers. We must obey the squad leader and Yang Yongxin, otherwise we will be shocked.

context:
### Idiom: 嫁鸡随鸡，嫁狗随狗
### Meaning: 封建礼教认为，女子出嫁后，不论丈夫好坏，都要永远跟从。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 不由得，鼻子一酸，眼泪淌了下来。在家时，她就听母亲说过，嫁鸡随鸡，嫁狗随狗，嫁给石头抱着走。
target: Involuntarily, her nose tingled, and tears streamed down her face. When she was at home, she had heard her mother say, "Marry a chicken and follow the chicken, marry a dog and follow the dog, if you marry a stone, carry it with you."

context:
### Idiom: 无情无义
### Meaning: 没有情义。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 而纲吉既不保证武士们的家门土地（改易减封），甚至严格考察蒙祖上余荫世袭某一官职的武士（整顿吏治），旦有懈怠不作为即施以惩戒。如此改革，对于武士而言自然是无情无义无理取闹的，如此主君，自然是不合格的、荒唐的。他们没有意识到的是，纲吉的自我定位首先是“国君”，其次才是“主君”。
target: But Kuniyoshi did not guarantee the land and property of the samurai families (reform of land and taxation), nor did he strictly investigate the hereditary official positions of the samurai who had received their land and property from their ancestors (reform of government). If any samurai showed any negligence and inaction, he would be punished. Such reform was obviously unreasonable and unfair to the samurai, and Kuniyoshi was a despicable and absurd ruler for them. They did not realize that Kuniyoshi's self-positioning was first a "king" and then a "master".

context:
### Idiom: 无往不胜
### Meaning: 无论到哪儿没有不胜利的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 成长路上，不是鲜花满地，一路坦途。而是荆棘遍布，要用最柔软处去踩，流血结痂，然后无往不胜。
target: On the way of growth, not all flowers are everywhere, but thorns are everywhere, you need to walk on the most sensitive of places, you bleed the crust, and then you won't be able to stop.

context:
### Idiom: 助纣为虐
### Meaning: 比喻帮助坏人干坏事。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 当“雾霾”这个同富足生活一起来到我们身边的新名词越来越多地出现在人们的生活中时，许多人开始作为看客抱怨政府的重视程度不够，指责工厂企业的社会责任感不强。深陷“霾”伏，我们当然都是受害者，但我们是否更应该反思自己，在“雾霾”大军肆虐的今天，我们是否助纣为虐？很多人将雾霾形成的主要原因归咎于重工业的发展，认为工厂化石燃料的燃烧才是雾霾形成的主要原因。
target: When smog, a new word that came with rich life, becomes more commonplace in people's lives, many people start as observers complaining about government's lack of attention and accusing manufacturing companies of lack of social responsibility. Under the "clouds," we certainly are victims, but shouldn't we also question ourselves, whether we are complicit in the "clouds" invasion? Many people blame the development of the heavy industry for the rising smog, believe that chemical combustion is the major cause of the smog.

context:
### Idiom: 推而广之
### Meaning: 广宽，大。推展开来而且把它扩大。也指从一件事情推及其它。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 从非洲的例子可见，中资的海外粮食相关的买地、并购不必然引起负面的观感，相关的发展也有积极正面的一面。假如中资更多将非洲经验推而广之，未来或有助缓助外国对中资收购农地、农企，以至中国企业在海外建构粮食供应链的抗拒与戒心。
target: It can be seen from the example in Africa that Chinese-funded overseas grain-related land purchases and mergers and acquisitions do not necessarily cause negative perceptions, and related developments also have a positive side. If more Chinese capital applies African experience to other countries, it may help ease foreign resistance and wariness against Chinese capital’s acquisition of farmland and agricultural enterprises, as well as Chinese companies’ establishment of food supply chains overseas.

context:
### Idiom: 扬扬自得
### Meaning: 十分得意的样子。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 一个世代的知识分子，一路从反抗日本殖民帝国压迫，到反抗国民党的独裁统治，追求台湾民主自治的理念，是始终如一，坚持一辈子的。然而，革命烈士都被描写成盲目附从跟班、受牵连的文青，而且还扬扬自得于把‘无知’当‘清白’，还有什么比这更悲情的呢？不仅知识分子，家族描写也是。
target: One generation of intellectuals, from resistance to Japanese imperialism, to resistance to the dictatorship of the Communist Party, has sought the idea of Taiwanese democracy for their entire lives. However, when the martyrs of revolution are presented as blind followers, involved, and proud of their 'ignorance' as 'pure', what is more tragic than this? Not only intellectuals, the family depiction is also.

context:
### Idiom: 相辅相成
### Meaning: 相互补充，相互促成。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 由此两个起到相辅相成的作用。
target: The two acts as a complement.

context:
### Idiom: 胸中万卷
### Meaning: 指读过大量的书。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 心有花满枝，漫眼尽红绯。胸中万卷图，落笔皆山河。回家时候看到杏花几乎全变得苍白——这是花要尽了。
target: In my heart, the branches are filled with flowers, and my eyes are filled with red. In my chest, there are thousands of pictures, and every stroke I write is mountains and rivers. When I got home, I saw that the apricot blossoms were almost all white - it seemed that the flowers were about to fade away.

context:
### Idiom: 小题大做
### Meaning: ①明清科举考试，以“四书”文句命题叫“小题”，以“五经”文句命题叫“大题”。“小题大作”本谓以五经文之法作四书文，后引申为拿小题目作大文章。②喻把小事渲染得很大，或当作大事来处理。有不值得、不恰当的意思。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 实木入榫家具考功夫 另一位本地新世代匠人阿圣，约3年前成立自家木工品牌自在猫，出自他手的绝大部分是实木入榫型家具，‘小题大做’更是其作品特色。阿圣投身匠人行列之前，是一位商业摄影师，本身更是一位猫奴，所以他手作家具时，出发点大多跟这两方面有关。
target: Craftsmanship is key in solid wood mortise and tenon furniture. Another local new-generation craftsman, Ah Sheng, established his own woodworking brand, Zi Zai Mao, about 3 years ago. The majority of his work is solid wood mortise and tenon furniture, and his works are characterized by meticulous attention to detail. Before becoming a craftsman, Ah Sheng was a commercial photographer and is himself a cat lover. Therefore, when he makes furniture, it is mostly related to these two aspects.

context:
### Idiom: 玉树琼枝
### Meaning: ①形容树木华美。②比喻贵家子弟。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 今日齐岳山草场无垠，云海苍茫，风景秀丽，春夏绿草茵茵、牛羊成群，秋冬白雪皑皑、玉树琼枝，一派北国风光，素有“中国南方最大的高山草场”、“华中地区最大的风力发电场”之美誉。
target: Today, the Qiyue Mountain grassland is boundless, the sea of clouds is vast, and the scenery is beautiful. In spring and summer, the grass is lush and there are herds of cattle and sheep. In autumn and winter, the snow is white and the trees are like jade, presenting a northern landscape. It is known as "China's largest alpine grassland in the south" and "the largest wind power generation base in the Huazhong region".

context:
### Idiom: 以学愈愚
### Meaning: 指用学习改变愚昧的秉性。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 胡俊章的藏书印有“胡氏珍本”、“安定胡氏”、“燕笙藏书”、“安定胡氏树德堂藏书”、“侍琴曾阅树德堂”、“树德堂胡氏藏书”、“极加宝惜树德堂”、“胡氏藏书之章”、“效山所珍”等。其收藏书籍包括：清陈邦彦辑《乌衣香牒》4册合《春驹小谱》2册（“乌衣”为燕子，“春驹”为蝴蝶，此本是搜集古今与“燕子”和“蝴蝶”有关的诗词歌赋文，1函6册，清乾隆刻本），《灵飞六甲经》碑帖（唐代著名小楷之一，胡俊章同治十年（1871）辛未题签，胞侄玉泽光绪二十六年（1900）庚子题签），明陈继儒辑《宝颜堂秘笈》（明万历刊本），明崔师训撰《大成易旨》不分卷（又有“以学愈愚”印，据罗振玉《雪堂类稿》）、（以下据1921年《重订浙江公立图书馆保存类目录》）清陶煊、张璨同辑《国朝诗的》62卷（康熙60年扬州刊本）、清沈德潜辑《国朝诗别裁集》32卷（乾隆刊本，加墨笔校注）、清卓尔堪辑《遗民诗》12卷附《近青堂诗》1卷（原刊本）、清严长明编《八表停云录》30卷（钞本，又有“诗卷长留天地间”印）、清汪正编《木渎诗存》14卷（钞本）、明卢纯学辑《明诗正声》60卷（明万历辛卯刊本）、宋陆游《陆放翁全集》157卷（汲古阁刊本）、元陈澔撰《礼记集说》10卷（汲古阁刊本）、清李锴撰《尚史》107卷（乾隆癸巳（1773）悦道楼刊本，又有“赐本臣”、“穆彰阿恭藏”印）、宋姚宽撰《西溪丛语》2卷（明刊本）、明徐应秋撰《玉芝堂谈荟》36卷（蒨园刊本）等。(关于胡俊章更早的家族祖辈，见其胞叔胡氏吉惠 (道光进士)篇）。
target: Hu's signatures includes "Hu's treasures," "Yuen-Sang's treasures," "Shute-Tade's treasures," "Heared when playing the piano in Shute-Tade's treasures," "Hu's treasures in the Slate-Tade's treasures," "Hu's treasures in the Slate-Tade's treasures," "Hu's treasures in the Slate-Tade's treasures," and "Hu's treasures in the Slate-Tade's treasures."

context:
### Idiom: 焚林而田
### Meaning: 烧毁树林以猎取野兽。比喻取之不留余地，只顾眼前利益，不顾长远利益。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 如意村百姓焚林而田，竭泽而渔，河神被派下凡惩戒。
target: The villagers of Qixi destroyed the forests and cultivated the fields, overfished the river and the river god was sent down to punish them.

context:
### Idiom: 死生有命，富贵在天
### Meaning: 指万事皆由天命注定。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 司马光云：“死生有命，富贵在天。”
target: Sima Guang: "There is fate in life and death, and wealth and honor are in heaven."

context:
### Idiom: 不足挂齿
### Meaning: 不值得一提。语出《汉书·叔孙通传》：“此特群盗鼠窃狗盗，何足置齿牙间哉？”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 街道上，一阵劲风吹来。砸中自己倒也只是点轻伤，不足挂齿。“路客小心！”。
target: A gust of wind blew across the street. Hitting himself was only a minor injury, not worth mentioning. "Beware of the pedestrians!"

context:
### Idiom: 夏日可畏
### Meaning: 象夏天酷热的太阳那样使人可怕。比喻为人严厉，令人畏惧。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 承载着希望与祝福的纸飞机飞向湛蓝的天空。夏日可畏 少年无畏。一切美好 和你 共同奔赴。
target: The paper plane carrying hope and blessings flew into the sky. Day of the dead, young man of the sea. All good things, with you, shall be done.

context:
### Idiom: 寒花晚节
### Meaning: 寒花寒天的花；晚节晚年的节操。比喻人晚节高尚。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 寒花晚节、渊清玉絜——点亮良其心灵的仙源中学老师们！——总有岁月可回首，曾有真情度芳华。王良其律师的微博视频。
target: Cold flowers late in the night, deep and clear jade belt – the teachers of Xiansheng Middle School, who light up their students' hearts! – Time will always come back, and there was once true feelings during the prime of youth. A video of Wang Liangqi Lawyer's Weibo.

context:
### Idiom: 天保九如
### Meaning: 天保《诗经·小雅》中的篇名；九如该诗中连用了九个如”字，有棕福寿延绵不绝之意。旧时祝寿的话，棕福寿绵长。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 男性长辈:祝您万事如意，金玉满堂，天保九如，地献五福![玫瑰][玫瑰][玫瑰]爷爷辈:祝您心想事成，天赐遐龄，福寿安康，天保九如，地献五福![玫瑰][玫瑰][玫瑰]奶奶辈:祝您岁岁平安，万事胜意，吉星高照，天保九如，地献五福![玫瑰][玫瑰][玫瑰]
target: Male elders: I wish you all the best, a house full of gold and jade, nine blessings from heaven, and five blessings from the earth! [Rose] [Rose] [Rose] Grandpa: I wish you all your wishes come true, a long life from heaven, longevity and health, blessings from heaven, and five blessings from the earth. Five Blessings! [Rose] [Rose] [Rose] Grandma: I wish you peace and success in all your years, auspicious stars shining high, nine blessings from heaven, and five blessings from the earth! [Rose] [Rose] [Rose]
